citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 pm on 08-
MAY-2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by stopping at the facility and the licensee's place of work. A
co-worker reported the licensee was working off site. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 pm on 08-
MAY-2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by stopping at the facility and the licensee's place of work. A 
co-worker reported the licensee was working off site. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for 
inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
